headline: Union Pacific Merger Delay Puts Regulatory Risks And Rail Rewards In Focus
summary: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) and Norfolk Southern have delayed filing a revised merger application after a regulatory request. The transaction is facing scrutiny from federal regulators and state attorneys general over potential competition issues. Regulatory feedback and the departure of a key antitrust official are adding uncertainty around timing and deal structure. Union Pacific, one of the major freight rail operators in the U.S., is at the center of a sector that supports bulk...

headline: Novartis enters licensing agreement with UNP for peptide therapeutics
summary: Under the agreement, UNP will receive up to $100m in upfront and pre-IND milestone payments.
